item.title: 'Happee Birthdae' to Harry Potter! Where to stream movies, celebrate
item.description: Don your birthday hats and grab your wands — it's time to wish a "Happee Birthdae" to one of the most iconic characters in pop culture.

item.title: Here's the 2025 team-by-team Sarasota and Manatee high school football schedules
item.description: The 2025 high school football season begins with Florida High School Athletic Association Kickoff Classics on Aug. 14. The regular season begins Aug. 21 and runs through Oct. 31 (with the exception of IMG which will play into November) with most teams playing 10 games in 11 weeks.

item.title: Sales tax to be eliminated on some hurricane supplies…
item.description: Thetropics may be quiet— as of 8 a.m. July 31 — but conditions can change rapidly and August is when activity ramps up.

item.title: When do Social Security payments go out in August?
item.description: Social Security paymentsin August will go out on a normal schedule, but if you were overpaid in the past, you may not be getting as much as you expected.

item.title: What is West Nile virus? New case of mosquito-borne…
item.description: A human case of West Nile virus was reported in Miami-Dade County the week of July 20-26, according to a report from theFlorida Department of Health, the same week deaths from the mosquito-borne disease were reported inColoradoandArizona.

item.title: Free speech group rates college policies: What rating is…
item.description: A nationalFirst Amendment advocacy groupgave fourFlorida universities"green lights" in its annual review of colleges' policies across the country that restrictfree speech and expression rights.
